data.eml:eml: A revision of Pseudopleonexes Conlan, 1982 (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Ampithoidae) with description of three new species from Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peart, Rachael A. (2006): A revision of Pseudopleonexes Conlan, 1982 (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Ampithoidae) with description of three new species from Australia. Zootaxa 1344: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174462
